text: Something that has been quietly slipped into the Republican tax plan: a provision that lets oil and gas companies drill in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge. This is an attack on pristine lands that belong to the American people.
(202) 224-3121. Memorize it. Add it to speed dial. Make as many calls as you can. We need to make our voices heard in order to stop the Republican tax plan in the Senate.
